sections.rationale: Simple heading + CTA link. Minimal content, best as default content.

6 portrait cards in a horizontal carousel. First card is 'featured' with larger title and no overlay number. Other cards have large semi-transparent overlay numbers (01-05). 4 visible initially, 2 hidden and revealed by scrolling. This requires a CUSTOM block — the standard Cards block doesn't support featured cards, overlay numbers, or carousel behavior. Needs custom JS for carousel navigation and CSS for dark theme, overlay numbers, and featured card styling.
sections.customBlockReason: Standard Cards block lacks: (1) featured card variant with larger title, (2) large semi-transparent overlay numbers, (3) horizontal scroll carousel with snap, (4) dark theme with #3f3f3f/#15171a backgrounds, (5) prev/next arrows + dot indicators navigation
